More common:: bloating or swelling of the face, arms, hands, lower legs, or feet
fast, pounding, or irregular heartbeat or pulse
increased urge to urinate during the night
numbness or tingling in the hands, feet, or lips
pain or swelling in the arms or legs without any injury
redness of the face, neck, arms, and occasionally, upper chest
swelling with pits or depressions on the skin

Moderate: AccessPak for HIV PEP Expanded with Kaletra (emtricitabine / lopinavir / ritonavir / tenofovir)
